code: var baseUrl='https://auth.nomoreparties.co';var getResponseData=function getResponseData(res){if(res.ok)return res.json();return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430 ".concat(res.status));};var registration=function registration(email,password){return fetch("".concat(baseUrl,"/signup"),{method:'POST',headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(function(res){return getResponseData(res);});};var authorization=function authorization(email,password){return fetch("".concat(baseUrl,"/signin"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(function(res){return getResponseData(res);}).then(function(data){if(data.token){localStorage.setItem('jwt',data.token);return data;}});};var getContent=function getContent(token){return fetch("".concat(baseUrl,"/users/me"),{method:"GET",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(res){return getResponseData(res);});};export var auth={registration:registration,authorization:authorization,getContent:getContent};
